channel.description: Recent content in truth on HeroLFG

item.title: True
item.description: Written by Gavin Palmer practicing a relationship with the Greatest Intentions Serious content should have version control with historical changes. What are my goals? I learn. I give intent. I invite feedback. I give progress. I give outcomes. I seek peace. What is Truth? Words are symbols and symbols can attempt to point at the Truth. The territory is real and the map attempts to point at the territory. What is not Truth?
